dt-option.name: language.searchPanes.emptyMessage
dt-option.summary: Add internationalisation to the empty message displayed as a pane option

type.description: By setting the `-init language.searchPanes.emptyMessage` option to a string, any empty cells found in the table will be represented in the pane by that string.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init language.searchPanes.emptyMessage` parameter is undefined. This means that the value of `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage` will be used. That value is `\<i\>No Data\</i\>`.
dt-option.description:
Empty cells will be represented in the panes by the option `-init language.searchPanes.emptyMessage`. This is useful as it's a more user-friendly way than just having a blank cell. The value is passed through the `-api i18n()` function.
This value superseeds `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage` and `-init columns.searchPanes.emptyMessage`. If it is desired for those values to be used `-init language.searchPanes.emptyMessage` should be undefined, as it is by default. When this is the case the two previous options will be used.
